traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
